front.title: •Owen Lars & •Beru Lars
front.gametext: Deploy free to Lars' Moisture Farm. Draws one battle destiny if not able to otherwise. If opponent has a Stormtrooper at a Tatooine site, you may not play Harvest. If lost during opponent's turn, Luke is power +6 until end of your next turn.
front.lore: Watchful guardians of Luke Skywalker. When the Lars' moisture farm was attacked by stormtroopers, Luke's life changed forever.

combo: Owen Lars & Beru Lars + Harvest + Luke
Owen Lars & Beru Lars + Harvest + Tatooine: Lars' Moisture Farm
